titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the School of Architecture, Yale University, Records Concerning Retrospecta
School of Architecture, Yale University, Records Concerning Retrospecta
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 09:40

did.unittitle: School of Architecture, Yale University, records concerning Retrospecta

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of digital images, text, and video and audio recordings used in the publication of Retrospecta .

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 19-E (YRG 19-E), Records of departments, offices, programs, and projects of the Yale School of Architecture.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The records were transferred from the Yale School of Architecture, 2006.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the materials is restricted. See Collection Contents for details.

Original born digital files, as well as preservation masters, may not be accessed due to their fragility. Researchers must consult use copies, or if none exist request that they be made. Born digital files cannot be accessed remotely. System requirements include a Manuscripts and Archives computer and file viewing software.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: School of Architecture, Yale University, Records Concerning Retrospecta (RU 1018). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Yale University records are arranged and described at the accession level by the creating office. The University Archives creates collection level descriptive records, but typically does no further arrangement and description at the accession level.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Retrospecta is an annual journal edited by architecture students and published by the Yale School of Architecture. The primary focus of the journal is student work, but activities of the School of Architecture are also covered.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of digital images, text, and video and audio recordings used in the publication of Retrospecta .

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by topic.

did.unittitle: Records of activities used to create Retrospecta
